00048     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00049     PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRawTC::PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRawTC(PagingLandScapeData2DManager *dataMgr)
00050     : PagingLandScapeData2D(dataMgr)
00051     {
00052             mImage = 0;
00053             input_max =  3000.0f;
00054         input_min = 0.0f;
00055         mMaxheight = _decodeRawTC (1.0f) * mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00056     }
00057     //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00058     const Real PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRawTC::getMaxAbsoluteHeight(void) const
00059     { 
00060         return _decodeRawTC (1.0f) * mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00061     }

00078     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00079     const Vector3 PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRawTC::getNormalAt (const Real x, const Real z)
00080     {
00081         #ifndef _LOADEDNORM
00082             return PagingLandScapeData2D::getNormal(x,z);
00083         #else
00084             if (mImage)
00085             {
00086                 unsigned int Pos = static_cast<unsigned int> ((z * mSize  + x) * mBpp);//4 bytes (mImage is RGBA)
00087 
00088                 if (mMax > Pos)
00089                 {
00090                     const Real normalscale = 1.0f / 127.0f;
00091                     return Vector3 (((Real)(mImage->getData()[Pos + 0]) - 128.0f) * normalscale,
00092                                     ((Real)(mImage->getData()[Pos + 1]) - 128.0f) * normalscale,
00093                                     ((Real)(mImage->getData()[Pos + 2]) - 128.0f) * normalscale);
00094                 }
00095                 else
00096                 {
00097                     return Vector3::UNIT_Y;
00098                 }
00099             }
00100             else
00101             {
00102                 return Vector3::UNIT_Y;
00103             }
00104         #endif //_NOLOAD
00105     }
00106     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00107     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRawTC::_save()
00108     {
00109         uchar *data = new uchar[ mXDimension * mZDimension * 2 ];   
00110 
00111         const double divider = 65535.0 / mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00112         
00113         unsigned int j = 0;
00114         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mXDimension*mZDimension; i++)
00115         {             
00116             ushort syn = static_cast <ushort>  (_encodeRawTC (mHeightData[i]) * divider);
00117             #if OGRE_ENDIAN == OGRE_ENDIAN_BIG
00118                 data[j] = uchar ((syn >> 8) & 0xff);
00119                         data[j+ 1] = uchar (syn & 0xff);
00120             #else
00121                         data[j] = uchar (syn & 0xff);
00122                         data[j+ 1] = uchar ((syn >> 8) & 0xff);
00123             #endif
00124             j += 2;            
00125         }
00126         const String fname = mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_filename + "." +
00127                                     StringConverter::toString(mPageZ) + "." +
00128                                                 StringConverter::toString(mPageX) + ".";
00129         const String extname = mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension;
00130 
00131 
00132        FileInfoListPtr finfo =  ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().findResourceFileInfo (
00133              mParent->getOptions()->groupName, 
00134              fname + extname);
00135        FileInfoList::iterator it = finfo->begin();
00136        if (it != finfo->end())
00137         {
00138             //FileInfo *inf = &(*it);
00139             char *olddir = ChangeToDir (const_cast< char * > (((it)->archive->getName()).c_str()));
00140             //FileSystemArchive::pushDirectory()
00141            
00142             std::ofstream outfile;
00143             String FileNameRaw;
00144            
00145             DataStreamPtr image_chunk(new MemoryDataStream ((void*)data,
00146                         mXDimension * mZDimension * 2 * sizeof (uchar), 
00147                         true)); 
00148 
00149             outfile.open (const_cast< char * > ((fname + "modif." + extname).c_str()),
00150                             std::ios::binary);
00151             // Write out
00152             outfile << image_chunk->getAsString ();
00153             outfile.close ();
00154 
00155 
00156             //FileSystemArchive::pushDirectory();
00157             RetablishDir (olddir);
00158         }
00159     }
00160     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00161     bool PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRawTC::_load(const unsigned int mX, const unsigned int mZ)
00162     {
00163         // Load data
00164         //mRawData.clear();
00165 
00166         const String strFileName = mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_filename + "." + 
00167                             StringConverter::toString(mZ) + "." +
00168                                         StringConverter::toString(mX) + ".";
00169 
00170             
00171         String finalName = strFileName + 
00172                         "modif." + 
00173                         mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension;
00174         if (!(mParent->getOptions()->Deformable && 
00175             ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(mParent->getOptions()->groupName,finalName)))
00176         {    
00177             finalName = strFileName + 
00178                 mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension;   
00179             if (!ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(mParent->getOptions()->groupName,finalName))
00180             { 
00181                 LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage(String("PLSM2 : Cannot find map named ") + finalName, 
00182                     LML_CRITICAL,
00183                     true);
00184                 return false;
00185             }
00186         }
00187         DataStreamPtr RawData;
00188         RawData = ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().openResource(finalName, 
00189                     mParent->getOptions()->groupName);
00190         
00191         // Validate size
00192         // Image size comes from setting (since RAW is not self-describing)
00193         // here 16 bits Raw file
00194         mXDimension = mSize;
00195         mZDimension = mXDimension;
00196         mBpp = 2;
00197 
00198         size_t numBytes = mSize * mSize * mBpp;
00199         if (RawData->size() != numBytes)
00200         {
00201             OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00202                 ") does not agree with configuration settings.", 
00203                 "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRaw::_load");
00204         }
00205                 mMax = static_cast<unsigned int> (numBytes) + 1;
00206 
00207         mMaxArrayPos = static_cast <unsigned int> (mSize * mSize);
00208         mHeightData = new Real[mMaxArrayPos];            
00209 
00210         const Real divider = 1.0f / 65535.0f;
00211         const Real scale  = mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00212         
00213         MemoryDataStream dc (RawData, 
00214                                                 true);
00215         const uchar *pSrc = dc.getPtr ();     
00216 
00217         mMaxheight = 0.0f;
00218         unsigned int j = 0;
00219         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mMax - 1;  i += mBpp)
00220         {                  
00221             #if OGRE_ENDIAN == OGRE_ENDIAN_BIG
00222                         ushort val = *pSrc++ <<8;
00223                         val += *pSrc++;
00224             #else
00225                         ushort val = *pSrc++;
00226                         val += *pSrc++ <<8;
00227             #endif
00228             const Real h = _decodeRawTC (val * divider)* scale;
00229             mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00230             mHeightData[j++] = h;
00231         }
00232     
00233 //            if (mParent->getOptions()->vertex_shadowed)
00234 //            {
00235 //                mShadow = new Image();
00236 //                mShadow->load(mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_filename +
00237 //                                ".HS." +
00238 //                                StringConverter::toString(mZ) + "." +
00239 //                                StringConverter::toString(mX) + "." +
00240 //                                "png");
00241 //                                //mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension);
00242 //            }
00243         return true;
00244     }
00245     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00246     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRawTC::_load()
00247     {
00248         // Load data
00249         DataStreamPtr RawData = ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().openResource(mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_filename +
00250                     "." + 
00251                     mParent->getOptions()->LandScape_extension, 
00252                     mParent->getOptions()->groupName);
00253 
00254         // Validate size
00255         // Image size comes from setting (since RAW is not self-describing)
00256         // here 16 bits Raw file
00257 
00258         mXDimension = mParent->getOptions()->RawWidth;
00259         mZDimension = mParent->getOptions()->RawHeight;
00260 
00261         mBpp = 2;
00262         
00263         const size_t sourceHeight = mZDimension;
00264         const size_t sourceWidth = mXDimension;
00265 
00266         computePowerof2PlusOneSize ();       
00267                 mSize = mXDimension;
00268 
00269         if (RawData->size() != sourceHeight*sourceWidth*2)
00270         {
00271             OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00272                 "RAW size (" + StringConverter::toString(static_cast<unsigned int> (RawData->size())) + 
00273                 ") does not agree with configuration settings.", 
00274                 "PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRaw::_load");
00275         }
00276     
00277         mMaxArrayPos = static_cast <unsigned int> (mXDimension * mZDimension);
00278         const size_t numBytes = mMaxArrayPos * mBpp;
00279                 mMax = static_cast<unsigned int> (numBytes) + 1;
00280 
00281         mHeightData = new Real[mMaxArrayPos];
00282 
00283         mMaxheight = 0.0f;
00284 
00285 
00286         MemoryDataStream dc(RawData, 
00287             true);
00288         const uchar *pSrc = dc.getPtr ();     
00289 
00290         const Real divider = 1.0f / 65535.0f;
00291         const Real scale  = mParent->getOptions()->scale.y;
00292         const unsigned int shift_fill = static_cast <unsigned int> (mXDimension - sourceWidth);
00293         unsigned int dest_pos = 0;
00294         //for some reason water is 65035 in SRTM files...
00295         const bool srtm_water = mParent->getOptions()->SRTM_water;
00296         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < sourceHeight; ++i)
00297         {
00298             for (unsigned int j = 0; j < sourceWidth; ++j)
00299             {
00300                 #if OGRE_ENDIAN == OGRE_ENDIAN_BIG
00301                             ushort val = *pSrc++ <<8;
00302                             val += *pSrc++;
00303                 #else
00304                             ushort val = *pSrc++;
00305                             val += *pSrc++ <<8;
00306                 #endif
00307 
00308                 if (srtm_water && (val - 65035) > 0)
00309                     val = 0;
00310 
00311                 const Real h = _decodeRawTC (val * divider) * scale;
00312                 mMaxheight = std::max (h, mMaxheight);
00313                 mHeightData[dest_pos++] = h;
00314             }
00315             memset (&mHeightData[dest_pos], 0, shift_fill);
00316             dest_pos+= shift_fill; 
00317         }
00318     }
00319

00321     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00322     void PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRawTC::_unload()
00323     {
00324             delete mImage;
00325                 mImage = 0;
00326          }
00327 
00328     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00329     inline Real PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRawTC::_decodeRawTC(const Real encoded) const
00330     {
00331             return ((Real) (encoded + 0.5f)) * (input_max - input_min) + input_min;
00332     }
00333     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00334     inline ushort PagingLandScapeData2D_HeightFieldRawTC::_encodeRawTC(const Real decoded) const
00335     {
00336         return static_cast <short> ((decoded - input_min) / (input_max - input_min) - 0.5f);
00337     }
